src:
America's top travel destinations

06 Nov 2019, 06:04



TripAdvisor announced the winners of its annual Travelers Choice Awards. Destinations made the list based on reviews and opinions from travelers who used TripAdvisor over a 12-month period.FreeImages.com/chobi capeta

TripAdvisor recently announced the winners of its annual Travelers' Choice Awards. Take a look at the top travel destinations in America, picked by travelers.
